external_games.name: RTK13 - Best scenario for "RTK" (Japan): "The Tyrant Returns" 『三國志』シナリオ案最優秀作品（日本）　「魔王帰還」

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Best Scenario for RTK Japan - The Tyrant Returns
summary: "The Tyrant Returns," the winner of the Original Scenario Contest held within Japan during October of 2016, will be added to the game.
